name: Stage Group (c)
title: TNM 7 Stage Group
notes:
**Note 1:** SEER*RSA added additional information to UICC 7th edition stages with UICC approval. If your registry submits the directly assigned Stage Groups to agencies other than SEER, please check the AJCC 7th edition manual to ensure you are using the appropriate logic. 

**Note 2:** The TNM combination is valid in AJCC 7th, but not UICC 7th, approved by UICC.
* Stage Group IIA - T2b, N0, M0, PSA unknown, Gleason unknown

**Note 3:** While the stage groups below are valid, the specified TNM combinations are only included in SEER*RSA.
* Stage Groups I or IIA (depending on PSA/Gleason) - cT1, N0, M0 - cT1 is not included in the stage group definition
* Stage Groups I or IIA (depending on PSA/Gleason) - T2, N0, M0 - T2 is not included in the stage group definition 
* Stages Groups IIA or IIB (depending on PSA/Gleason) - T2, N0, M0 - T2 is not included in the stage group definition
* Stage Group III - T3, N0, M0 - T3 is not included in the stage group definition
* Stage Group IV - T4, NX, M0, Any PSA, Any Gleason - NX is not included in the stage group definition

**Note 4:** For Gleason, use SSF8 for Clinical.

**Note 5:** TNM does not include an in situ category for this schema. Assign 88 to stage group for in situ cases.
rows:
Any PSA
Any PSA
Any PSA

Any Gleason
Any Gleason
Any Gleason
